Text: this is one of the best songs i ever herd
''Come to the Sabbat'' covered by the swedish old school black metal band BEWITCHED.
This album is truly superb.  A lost classic rock gem, any classic rock enthusiast will more than likely enjoy this.

I have one major beef with your review, sir.  The "cheesy" breakdown in the song "Seduction" I believe is supposed to represent purgatory, at least thats how I interpret it.  Also, I find the sound to be whimsically-demonic and fanciful, not "upbeat" and "cheery."  Although I'd concede that it is ANYTHING but black metal.  At any rate, great lp, check it out.
